<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if defined(&#95;&#95;APPLE&#95;&#95;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Darwin&#39;s default stack size for threads except the main one is only 512KB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is not enough for some/many normal LLVM compilations. This implements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same interface as std::thread but requests the same stack size as the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// main thread (8MB) before creation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; llvm:{':thread:'}:DefaultStackSize = 8 &#42; 1024 &#42; 1024;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#elif defined(&#95;AIX)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// On AIX, the default pthread stack size limit is ~192k for 64-bit programs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This limit is easily reached when doing link-time thinLTO. AIX library</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// developers have used 4MB, so we&#39;ll do the same.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; llvm:{':thread:'}:DefaultStackSize = 4 &#42; 1024 &#42; 1024;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; llvm:{':thread:'}:DefaultStackSize;</span></CodeLine>
